title: I simply Cant explain it...
description: Alex and Sam have been best friends for years but when Alex's old friend Ewan returns home, after living in Washington, he is instantly drawn to Sam. As the two become closer Alex begins to question his feelings for Sam. Yet as Sam begins to distance herself from both Alex and her other friends, questions are raised. A darker side to Ewan is revealed which puts Sam in danger, as things become more serious Alex battles with his feelings while Sam battles with something much worse.
author: Niamh Whelan
